id.description: The name that was originally given to the experiment on creation but formatted as an ID ("A Experiment" -> "a_experiment").

description.description: A helpful summary of what this experiment does

createdTime.description: The timestamp when this experiment was created.

creatorID.description: The Statsig ID of the creator of this experiment.

creatorName.description: The Statsig Username of the creator of this experiment.

creatorEmail.description: The email of the creator of this experiment.

targetApps.description: Target apps assigned to this experiment

lastModifierID.description: The Statsig UserID of the last modifier of this experiment.

idType.description: The type of ID which the experiment is based on.

status.description: The current status of the experiment.

layerID.description: The layer that the experiment is in.

hypothesis.description: A statement that will be tested by this experiment.

primaryMetrics.description: Main metrics needed to evaluate your hypothesis

secondaryMetrics.description: Additional metric you may want to monitor that might impact the analysis or final decision of the experiment

groups.description: The test groups for your experiment

size.description: What percentage of traffic should be passed into this group

allocation.description: Percent of layer allocated to this experiment

duration.description: How long the experiment is expected to last in days

targetingGateID.description: Restrict your experiment to users passing the selected feature gate.

defaultConfidenceInterval.description: Default error margin used for results

launchedGroupID.description: ID of the launched group, null otherwise

startTime.description: timestamp at which the experiment was started

endTime.description: timestamp at which the experiment concluded. This is triggered when a variation is shipped or when the experiment is abandoned
